杻字的基本解释

杻
niǔ
古书上说的一种树。

杻
chǒu
古代手铐一类的刑具：杻械。

杻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niǔ］
［《廣韻》女久切，上有，娘。］
木名。檍树。
[②]［chǒu］
［《廣韻》敕久切，上有，徹。］
“扭2”的被通假字。
刑具。即手铐。

杻字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　杻； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页514第07
【唐韻】【集韻】敕九切【正韻】齒九切，?音丑。械也。本作抙。　又【唐韻】【韻會】?女久切，音紐。【詩·唐風】隰有杻。【陸璣疏】檍也。葉似杏而尖，白色，皮正赤。多曲少直枝，葉茂好，二月開花如練而細蘂蓋樹，名萬歲枝。或謂之牛筋，材可爲弓幹。　又【集韻】忍九切，音蹂。義同。

handcuffs
niǔ

handcuffs

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niǔ］
["Guangyun" female long cut, there is on it, mother. ]
Wooden name. Sorrel tree.
[②] [chǒu]
["Guangyun" is cut for a long time, there is on it, and it is thorough. ]
"Twist 2" was passed falsely.
Instruments of torture. Namely handcuffs.
handcuffs
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　杻; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 514 Page 07
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Nine Cuts of Chi [Zheng Yun] Nine cuts of teeth, ugly sound. Machinery also. This is for 抙.　[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Club]? Female long cut, sound button. 【Poetry·Tang Feng】Xi Youli. [Lu Ji Shu] Shu also. The leaves are pointed like apricots, white, and the skin is red. More curved and less straight branches, good leaves, blooming in February like a tree with fine stamens and covered trees, known as long live branches. Or called beef tendon, the material can be bow stem.　[Jiyun] Nine cuts with endurance, sound freaks. The same meaning.
